formintro:
Under new UK regulations, known as the Travel Rule, all UK exchanges need to request some additional details about withdraws.

This is to protect you from unintended transfers and scams, similar to the way your bank asks for the name of a receiver when you transfer funds.

Please accept our apologies for the delay - this is a temporary step which will be removed shortly as part of the withdraw procedure - any fees you have paid for the withdraw will be refunded.

questions.label: Transaction Details
questions.guidance: Please provide additional details for the previous answer.

questions.label: Transaction Address
questions.guidance: This is the address the cryptocurrency was sent to

questions.label: Transaction Amount
questions.guidance: Amount of the transaction and currency

questions.label: Receiver Details
questions.guidance: Please provide additional details for the previous answer.

questions.label: Receiver
questions.placeholder: First name and lastname of receiver (or business name)
questions.guidance: Who is the receiver (beneficiary) of this transaction?

questions.label: Destination Type

values.text: Unhosted Wallet (e.g. phone wallet, ledger, trezor)

questions.guidance: How frequently do you expect to make this or a similiar transaction

questions.label: Destination Business / Device
questions.guidance: Where is this transaction going to? Is it an exchange? A phone wallet? A hardware wallet?
